attributes.action: Revael the identity of Jamie Bulger's killers and to divulge the details of the new charges against Jon Venables.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What gives John Venables the right to anonymity? If he were a paedophile he would be on the register and exposed. He actually murdered a child so why should he be any different and get the privilege of a new identity and protection. He is obviously not a reformed character and does not deserve any privacy regarding the recent allegations made against him.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
